subject: p16319601
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Extensive right pleural effusion with areas of atelectasis and an unchanged left PICC line. Small nodular opacity, projecting over the border of the ventral aspect of the left fourth rib is unchanged since several examinations.
